com.risk.team.services

Class RiskMapVerify

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.team.services.RiskMapVerify
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskMapVerify
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Map Validation class contains methods for the verification of a already map file, that the user will load for starting a game.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kartika Patil
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • validateMapFile

        public boolean validateMapFile(java.lang.String mapFile)
        Method for validation of a map file. At first it check for validity of map tag data. Then it checks for continent and control value. After receiving the the continent and control value it moves to check countries.

        In territories it reads all the countries one by one, along with its x, y coordinates and continent. Then it reads the list of adjacent countries and checks for the validation, that whether the two countries are present in each others list of adjacent countries or not

        Parameters:
        mapFile - String that contains name of the file to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if map is validated; otherwise false

      • getCountriesFromContinent

        public java.util.HashSet<Country> getCountriesFromContinent(java.lang.String continent,
                                                            java.util.HashMap<Continent,java.util.HashSet<Country>> countriesInAContinent)
        Method for getting countries corresponding to a country.
        Parameters:
        continent - String that is the name of the continent.
        countriesInAContinent - HashMap consisting of continents and their countries.
        Returns:
        HashSet countries inside a continent.

      • checkAllTags

        public boolean checkAllTags(java.lang.String fileData)
        Method for checking whether all the attributes are present in a map file or not, these attributes are mapTag data, continents and territories.
        Parameters:
        fileData - String that has the particular tags.
        Returns:
        true if mapTagData is present; otherwise false.

        Returns:
